posts.name: jimfl014
posts.cooked:
We are trying to order spur gears that correlate to the following Falcon spur gears.  16 tooth for sport gearbox, 14 tooth and 12 tooth for the tough boxes, part numbers AM-4144, AM-4147, AM-4146

The center distance spec is killing us, AM doesn’t have that spec.  At $9 a pop it gets pricey to cover all your bases

Any help is appreciated.

posts.name: Ari Meles-Braverman
posts.cooked:
First, let’s be clear. SplineXS is the name of the shaft for a Kraken motor. Falcon motors use a different spline shaft. Which one are you looking for?

Vex has 12t and 14t Falcon gears. So does WCP , but their 12t gear is out of stock. If you want SplineXS gears for a Kraken, your only source right now is at WCP though it seems they haven’t started shipping them yet (all are backordered).

For Sport planetary gearboxes, you can use this gear from AM for a Falcon motor. No input gear has been made for the Kraken SplineXS shaft yet as far as I know. Note that the Sport input gear has different size teeth than the majority of gears used in FRC (0.8 module vs 20 dp), so you can’t just use any 16t gear.

link_counts.title: 16 Tooth 0.7 Module Falcon Spline Bore Steel Pinion Gear - AndyMark, Inc

posts.name: EricH
posts.cooked:
AriMB:

First, let’s be clear. SplineXS is the name of the shaft for a Kraken motor. Falcon motors use a different spline shaft. Which one are you looking for?

It sounds like they’re trying to set up a Kraken to directly fill a Falcon’s slot. Means they need the Kraken (SplineXS) gear that will go where the Falcon gear went. That means WCP as the source, NOT AM .

posts.name: jimfl014
posts.cooked: We are looking to replace Falcons with Krakens.  Realize everything is backordered, but we need to put our name on the list.  We ordered Krakens the day they were announced; at the time gears didn’t seem like it would be a big deal seeing as they are simple manufactured parts.

posts.name: Nathan Nguyen
posts.cooked:
As of now AndyMark has no gears for SplineXS (Kraken). For Sport Gearboxes, you will need to wait until AM or WCP (most likely AM ) releases gears for that gearbox, but for tough boxes (toughboxes use 20DP gears), WCP is selling (on backorder) 14T and 12T gears . There is a discount code Kraken30 for any SplineXS hardware from WCP until Dec 30, 2023.
